channel.title: My Gman Impersonation
channel.description:
Here is my G-Man impersonation...can [i][b]you[/b][/i] beat it? :retard:
Anyway, it does probably need more "gruff" like my friend said.
[url]https://www.supload.com/sound_confirm.php?get=786252607.wav[/url]
And no, this was just my voice by itself, I didn't edit it. I think I do need to try deepening my voice just a little bit in real life too.

item.title: My Gman Impersonation
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
OK so this is a year damn old, and a triple post. But I have actually not really practiced the G-Man impersonation seriously again until today.

Here it is. I actually thought that someone put the Half-Life ending G-Man speech in place of my voice because it was so spot on for the most part.

Yeah, I know the dialogue is off.

I forgot I had dropbox or something…so I was trying to figure out my filefront password.

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/10208060/Other%20Files/gman_upload_file.mp3

I sound nothing like this when I talk normally, it is difficult to pull off in reality.

Here is more practicing of the G-man Half-Life 2 introduction. Maybe I will try the Half-Life 2 Alpha lines.

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/10208060/Other%20Files/gman_intro.mp3

You can hear what my normal everyday speaking voice sounds like.

“XEN” is just a funny word to say in a gman voice.

I probably said it at too high a pitch.

There are no changes through programs to the sound file.

The interference is from me holding my headset out in front of me rather than holding it and me facing more towards the microphone.

Read full topic

item.description:
Hair-Man:

The first one was the best in my opinion. Sounded more natural.

I agree, I got lucky when I did that one.

Sorry for double post.

item.title: My Gman Impersonation
item.dc:creator: James.Curse
item.description:
Actually I think it was quite good. You just need to make it sound more deep and “dry” somehow.

av3nger:

Yes, I know what you mean actually. My “speech” is kind of rough, it probably won’t be final.

This one is very random and stupid, but I laugh at it lmfao. https://www.supload.com/sound_confirm.php?get=19076311.wav

Usually my voice sounds more like gman than I recorded in that one.

Also, this recording is funny as well: https://www.supload.com/sound_confirm.php?get=430160842.wav

LOL “What the fuck does g-man even fucking means?”

Read full topic
